entity.name: Andy Beshear
entity.description: US Governor of Kentucky, Andy Beshear

text: Gov Beshear thanks unknown person who dropped off 4k swabs today. That person, he says, didn't come inside to say who they were but these medical supplies are becoming hard to find & needed to do testing.
